name: Red Lace Tumblr Dashboard
description:
Red Lace Tumblr Dashboard is almost perfect. DON'T LIKE THE COLOR? Check out my other Lace Tumblr Dashboards. I've got pink, blue, green and yellow.

EXTRA FEATURES: Shrinks the tagged area so you can see all your tags at once. It also shrinks nested blockquotes so you can read what peeps are saying.

Based off yslaurent's Gray & Light Purple Vintage. Help from Ohne Mitleid.

Follow me at mercave.tumblr.com :)
